mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.user_id AS userId,A.inst_id AS instId,A.apply_type AS applyType,A.apply_date AS applyDate,A.message AS message,A.reply_status AS replyStatus,A.reply_desc AS replyDesc,A.reply_user_id AS replyUserId,A.reply_username AS replyUsername,A.file1 AS file1,A.file2 AS file2,A.file3 AS file3,A.file4 AS file4,A.attr1 AS attr1,A.attr2 AS attr2,A.attr3 AS attr3,A.attr4 AS attr4,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.address AS address,A.location AS location,A.phone AS phone,A.sex AS sex,A.birthday AS birthday,A.job_id AS jobId,A.title_names AS titleNames,A.introduction AS introduction,A.idcard_num AS idcardNum,A.money AS money,A.shop_name AS shopName,A.shop_logo AS shopLogo,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.link_type AS linkType,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,u.serial AS userSerial, u.username AS userName , u.real_name AS realName,d.code_name AS codeName ,d2.dict_name AS productTypeName
LEFT JOIN user u ON A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN dict d ON A.apply_type = d.id LEFT JOIN dict d2 ON A.attr2 = d2.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
